mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todos ( user_id, workout_id, exercise_id, date, sets_number, reps_target, weight, rest_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{workoutId}, #{exerciseId}, #{date}, #{setsNumber}, #{repsTarget}, #{weight}, #{restTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(sets_number) FROM todos WHERE date = (SELECT date FROM todos WHERE todo_id = #{todoId}) AND exercise_id = (SELECT exercise_id FROM todos WHERE todo_id = #{todoId}) AND user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE todos SET reps_target = COALESCE(#{repsTarget}, reps_target), weight = COALESCE(#{weight}, weight), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE todo_id = #{todoId} AND user_id = #{userId};
